DERBY-4387 Infinite loop in PredicateList.joinClauseTransitiveClosure()
This patch, derby-4387, fixes a corner case of the closure code in which the outer and the inner table is the same. This led to adding the same, new predicate twice to the same table, causing the infinite loop. The patch also adds a test case, which, without the fix, shows the infinite loop.
